plot: An aging and crippled veteran body snatcher devises a unique method of continuing his nefarious trade by acquiring the services of an apprentice.
title: Rotation
plot_es: An aging and crippled veteran body snatcher devises a unique method of continuing his nefarious trade by acquiring the services of an apprentice.
plot_en: An aging and crippled veteran body snatcher devises a unique method of continuing his nefarious trade by acquiring the services of an apprentice.
